name: Don't Disturb My Sleep
description:
The ditch near your house has not been taken care of for a long time. And now it has caused mosquitoes to spread. These pests are flying around you every single night. You are too lazy to wake up and turn on the lights, time to kill them by listening to the sound.

  • This game has three modes:

1)Endless Mode= Has three lives and unlimited time

         Game Goal=Kill all the insects and don't let them near you

2)Jamming Mode= Has three lives and unlimited time

         Game Goal= Kill mosquitoes without letting them near you, but do not kill the bee

3)Time Mode= Unlimited the lives but with time restriction

          Game Goal= Kill the mosquitoes within the limited time.
